text:
Otto, prueba ...`<?prg` 

	local hCurl
	local cUrl 	:= ""
	local cXml  := '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>...'
	// ApiKey
	local cKey := "5V88PPV1RZEZOZ382QY5EY9LXLYIYV6N"
	// or usr:pwd
	local cKey := "user:password"

	curl_global_init()	

	if ! empty( hCurl := curl_easy_init() )

		curl_easy_setopt( hCurl, HB_CURLOPT_URL, cUrl )
		curl_easy_setopt( hCurl, HB_CURLOPT_USERPWD, cKey )
		curl_easy_setopt( hCurl, HB_CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, "POST" )
		curl_easy_setopt( hCurl, HB_CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, cXml )			
		curl_easy_setopt( hCurl, HB_CURLOPT_DL_BUFF_SETUP )

		if curl_easy_perform(hCurl) == 0
			cResponse := curl_easy_dl_buff_get( hCurl )
		else
			cResponse := "Error"
		endif
	endif

	curl_global_cleanup()
	return cResponse
?>

elements.text: Otto, prueba ...
<?prg

local hCurl
	local cUrl 	:= ""
	local cXml  := '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>...'
	// ApiKey
	local cKey := "5V88PPV1RZEZOZ382QY5EY9LXLYIYV6N"
	// or usr:pwd
	local cKey := "user:password"

	curl_global_init()	

	if ! empty( hCurl := curl_easy_init() )

		curl_easy_setopt( hCurl, HB_CURLOPT_URL, cUrl )
		curl_easy_setopt( hCurl, HB_CURLOPT_USERPWD, cKey )
		curl_easy_setopt( hCurl, HB_CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, "POST" )
		curl_easy_setopt( hCurl, HB_CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, cXml )			
		curl_easy_setopt( hCurl, HB_CURLOPT_DL_BUFF_SETUP )

		if curl_easy_perform(hCurl) == 0
			cResponse := curl_easy_dl_buff_get( hCurl )
		else
			cResponse := "Error"
		endif
	endif

	curl_global_cleanup()
	return cResponse
?>

oOle := CreateObject( "MSXML2.XMLHTTP" )
oOle::Open( "POST", cURL, .f. )
oOle:SetRequestHeader( "user", 		alltrim( cHotelCode ) )
oOle:SetRequestHeader( "password", 	alltrim( cMsgPassword ) )
oOle:SetRequestHeader( "Content-Type", "text/xml")
oOle:Send( cXML )
? oOle:responseText

text:
METHOD teste(oController) CLASS WS

   local hResponse := {=>}
   LOCAL cDirDbf:= AP_GetEnv( "PATH_DBF" ),oError
   TRY 
      USE (  cDirDbf+ "\AGENDA.DBF" )   ALIAS "age" VIA "ADS"
      hResponse[ 'success' ] := NetErr()
      IF NetErr()    
         hResponse['cod'] := "8"
         oController:oResponse:SendJson( hResponse )        
      ELSE
         hResponse['cod'] := "9"
         oController:oResponse:SendJson( hResponse )
      ENDIF
   CATCH oError
      hResponse['cod'] := "10"
      oController:oResponse:SendJson( hResponse )
   END
   
RETURN NIL

text: puedes usar una estructura tradicional clipper cono BEGIN SEQUENCE tambien

elements.text: puedes usar una estructura tradicional clipper cono BEGIN SEQUENCE tambien

text:
METHOD teste(oController) CLASS WS

   local hResponse := {=>}
   LOCAL cDirDbf:= AP_GetEnv( "PATH_DBF" ),oError
   BEGIN SEQUENCE
      USE (  cDirDbf+ "\AGENDA.DBF" )   ALIAS "age" VIA "ADS"
      hResponse[ 'success' ] := NetErr()
      IF NetErr()    
         hResponse['cod'] := "8"
         oController:oResponse:SendJson( hResponse )        
      ELSE
         hResponse['cod'] := "9"
         oController:oResponse:SendJson( hResponse )
      ENDIF
   RECOVER USING oError
      hResponse['cod'] := "10"
      oController:oResponse:SendJson( hResponse )
   END SEQUENCE

RETURN NIL

elements.text:
METHOD teste(oController) CLASS WS

   local hResponse := {=>}
   LOCAL cDirDbf:= AP_GetEnv( "PATH_DBF" ),oError
   BEGIN SEQUENCE
      USE (  cDirDbf+ "\AGENDA.DBF" )   ALIAS "age" VIA "ADS"
      hResponse[ 'success' ] := NetErr()
      IF NetErr()    
         hResponse['cod'] := "8"
         oController:oResponse:SendJson( hResponse )        
      ELSE
         hResponse['cod'] := "9"
         oController:oResponse:SendJson( hResponse )
      ENDIF
   RECOVER USING oError
      hResponse['cod'] := "10"
      oController:oResponse:SendJson( hResponse )
   END SEQUENCE

RETURN NIL
